com.sponsorpay.sdk.android.publisher.currency
Class CurrencyServerAbstractResponse

java.lang.Object
  com.sponsorpay.sdk.android.publisher.currency.CurrencyServerAbstractResponse
Direct Known Subclasses:
CurrencyServerDeltaOfCoinsResponse, RequestErrorResponse
public abstract class CurrencyServerAbstractResponse
extends java.lang.Object

Encloses a basic response received from the SponsorPay's Virtual Currency Server and methods to perform parsing of the returned JSON-encoded data.

parseSuccessfulResponse

public abstract void parseSuccessfulResponse()
Implement to parse a successful-HTTP-status-code containing response.

invokeOnSuccessCallback

public abstract void invokeOnSuccessCallback()
Implement to invoke the response-type-specific on success callback notification.

setResponseData

public void setResponseData(int responseStatusCode,
                            java.lang.String responseBody,
                            java.lang.String responseSignature)
Sets the raw response data.

Parameters:
responseStatusCode - HTTP status code returned by the server.
responseBody - Body of the HTTP response.
responseSignature - Signature of the response extracted from the response headers.

setResponseListener

public void setResponseListener(SPCurrencyServerListener listener)
Set the response listener which will be notified when the parsing is complete. Every response type may call a different listener method.

Parameters:
listener -

verifySignature

public boolean verifySignature(java.lang.String securityToken)
Verify calculate the signature of the response with the provided security token and compare it against the server-provided response signature.

Parameters:
securityToken - Security token which will be used to calculate the signature.
Returns:
true if the calculated signature matches the server-provided signature. false otherwise.

parseAndCallListener

public void parseAndCallListener(java.lang.String securityToken)
Performs a second-stage error checking, parses the response and invokes the relevant method of the listener registered with setResponseListener(SPCurrencyServerListener).

Parameters:
securityToken - Security token used to verify the authenticity of the response.

hasErrorStatusCode

public boolean hasErrorStatusCode()
Returns true if the response contains an HTTP status code out of the 200s.

Returns:
false if HTTP status code is between 200 and 299. True otherwise.

parseErrorResponse

public void parseErrorResponse()
Parses a response containing a non-successful HTTP status code. Tries to extract the error code and error message from the response body.

invokeOnErrorCallback

public void invokeOnErrorCallback()
Invokes the SPCurrencyServerListener.onSPCurrencyServerError(CurrencyServerAbstractResponse) of the registered callback.

getErrorType

public CurrencyServerAbstractResponse.RequestErrorType getErrorType()
Gets the error condition in which this request / response has resulted.

Returns:
A CurrencyServerAbstractResponse.RequestErrorType.

public java.lang.String getErrorCode()
Gets the error code returned by the server.

Returns:

getErrorMessage

public java.lang.String getErrorMessage()
Gets the error message returned by the server.

Returns:

getParsingInstance

public static CurrencyServerAbstractResponse getParsingInstance(VirtualCurrencyConnector.RequestType requestType)
Returns the appropriate subclass to enclose and parse the response to a request of the passed type.

Parameters:
requestType - The type of the request whose response can be parsed by the returned instance.
Returns:
An instance of a subclass of CurrencyServerAbstractResponse, or null if no subclass is known for parsing the provided VirtualCurrencyConnector.RequestType.
